original: krodhāpūrṇaiḥ subahubhirayomudgaraistāḍyamānā manyate taṃ paramiva sukhaṃ nārakā yadvadeva // Śl_85 //
analyzed: krodha āpūrṇaiḥ su bahubhiḥ ayaḥ mudgaraiḥ tāḍyamānā manyate tam param iva sukham nārakāḥ yadvat eva

analyzed: tadvat duḥkhaiḥ aniśam avaśaḥ dāruṇaiḥ pīḍyamānaḥ tāvatkālam jaraṇa maṇara kṣobha muktaḥ kathaṃcid

original: yāvadyāvajjagati sakale jāyate saukhyasaṃjñā tāvattāvadbahutaraśikho jāyate rāgabahniḥ /
analyzed: yāvat yāvat jagati sakale jāyate saukhya saṃjñā tāvat tāvat bahutara śikhaḥ jāyate rāga bahniḥ

analyzed: yāvat yāvat niyatam aśubhā bhāvanā yāti vṛddhim

analyzed: tāvat tāvat taralataratam iti moha andhakāram

analyzed: durgandhi pūti vikṛtaiḥ aravindam indum indīvaram ca tulayanti yadā aṅganā aṅgaiḥ

original: tasyānṛtasya phalamugramidaṃ kavīnāṃ tāsveva garbhanilayaṃ padamī viśanti // Śl_89 //
analyzed: tasya anṛtasya phalam ugram idam kavīnām tāsu eva garbha nilayam pad amī viśanti

original: kā saugatirjagati yā śataśo na yātā kiṃ tatsukhaṃ yadaśakṛnna purānubhūtam /
analyzed: kā saugatiḥ jagati yā śataśas na yātā kim tat sukham yat aśakṛt na purā anubhūtam

original: kāstāḥ śriyaścapalacāmaracāruhāsāḥ prāptā na yāstadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ // Śl_90 //
analyzed: kāḥ tāḥ śriyaḥ capala cāmara cāru hāsāḥ prāptāḥ na yāḥ tat api vardhate eva rāgaḥ

original: nadyo na tā na vihṛtaṃ pulineṣu yāsāṃ sthānaṃ na tajjagati yatra kṛto na vāsaḥ /
analyzed: nadyaḥ na tāḥ na vihṛtam pulineṣu yāsām sthānam na tat jagati yatra kṛtaḥ na vāsaḥ

original: vyomnāpi tanna padamasti na yatra yātaṃ duṣpūraṇastadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ // Śl_91 //
analyzed: vyomnā api tat na padam asti na yatra yātam duṣpūraṇaḥ tat api vardhate eva rāgaḥ

original: duḥkhaṃ na tadyadasakṛnna purānubhūtaṃ kāmā na te jagati yairiha tṛptirāsīt /
analyzed: duḥkham na tat yat asakṛt na purā anubhūtam kāmāḥ na te jagati yaiḥ iha tṛptiḥ āsīt

original: sattvo na so 'sti jaṭhare śayitaṃ na yasya saṃsāriṇastadapi nāsti kathaṃ virāgaḥ // Śl_92 //
analyzed: sattvaḥ na saḥ sti jaṭhare śayitam na yasya saṃsāriṇaḥ tat api nā asti katham virāgaḥ

original: atyāyate jagati janmaparigrahe 'sminduḥkhe sukhe ca bahuśaḥ parivartamānaḥ /
analyzed: atyāyate jagati janma parigrahe smin duḥkhe sukhe ca bahuśas parivartamānaḥ

original: nāsau jano jagati yo na babhūva bandhurdveṣoragastadapi tiṣṭhati bhīmabhogaḥ // Śl_93 //
analyzed: na asau janaḥ jagati yaḥ na babhūva bandhuḥ dveṣa uragaḥ tat api tiṣṭhati bhīma bhogaḥ

original: yaiḥ sārdhametya hasitaṃ lalitaṃ pragītamekatra pītamaśitaṃ ca kṛtāśca goṣṭhyaḥ /
analyzed: yaiḥ sārdham etya hasitam lalitam pragītam ekatra pītam aśitam ca kṛtāḥ ca goṣṭhyaḥ

original: kālakrameṇa gamitāḥ kati ke 'pi ramyā nītāḥ samāśca viṣamāśca daśāḥ kathaṃcit // Śl_94 //
analyzed: kāla krameṇa gamitāḥ kati ke pi ramyāḥ nītāḥ samāḥ ca viṣamāḥ ca daśāḥ kathaṃcid

original: tānārjavaṃ javavivartanadṛṣṭanaṣṭānāvartamadhyapatitāniva vīkṣyamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: tān ārjavam java vivartana dṛṣṭa naṣṭa an āvarta madhya patitān iva vīkṣyamāṇaḥ

original: saṃsārasāgaragatānapahāya bandhūnekaḥ prayāti yadi nāsti tataḥ kṛtaghnaḥ // Śl_95 //
analyzed: saṃsāra sāgara gatān apahāya bandhūn ekaḥ prayāti yadi nā asti tatas kṛtaghnaḥ

original: aṅkasthitena śiśunā vivaśena yāsāṃ pītaḥ payodhararasaṃ praṇayānuyātaḥ /
analyzed: aṅka sthitena śiśunā vivaśena yāsām pītaḥ payodhara rasam praṇaya anuyātaḥ

original: tanniṣphalapracuradurlalitaikabhājaḥ ko nāma dasyurapi hātumihotsaheta // Śl_96 //
analyzed: tad niṣphala pracura durlalita eka bhājaḥ kaḥ nāma dasyuḥ api hātum iha utsaheta

original: yā saṃsthito 'yamudare 'pi kṛtāvakāśo yāḥ snehaviklavadhiyaḥ ślathamenamūhuḥ /

original: vikīrṇe duḥkhaughairjagati vivaśe 'sminnaśaraṇe parārthe yadduḥkhaṃ tadiha sukhamāhuḥ supuruṣāḥ /

original: kṣaṇaṃ kṣuttṛṣṇoṣṇaśramavigamaramyānarucaḥ paraṃ kṛtvā teṣāmapi yadiha ka ivāsya pratisamaḥ // Śl_98 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam kṣudh tṛṣṇā uṣṇa śrama vigama ramyāna rucaḥ param kṛtvā teṣām api yat iha kaḥ iva asya pratisamaḥ

original: na sāramyairyā naiva ca nṛpatilakṣmīparikarairna dārairnāpatyairna surabhavane nāsuragatau /

original: kathaṃcitsaṃprāpyaṃ x viṣayasukhaṃ bhogaparamairlabhante yā prītiṃ parahitasukhādhānaniratāḥ // Śl_99 //
analyzed: kathaṃcid saṃprāpyam viṣaya sukham bhoga paramaiḥ labhante yā prītim para hita sukha ādhāna niratāḥ

analyzed: svayam ghāsa grāsam paśuḥ api karoti eva sulabham yadṛcchā labdham vā pibati salilam gāḍha tṛṣitaḥ

original: parasyārtha kartuṃ yadiha puruṣo 'yaṃ prayatate tadasya svaṃ tejaḥ sukhamidamaho pauruṣamidam // Śl_100 //
analyzed: parasya artha kartum yat iha puruṣaḥ yam prayatate tat asya svam tejaḥ sukham idam aho pauruṣam idam

original: yadālokaṃ kuvan bhramati raviraśrāntaturagaḥ sadālokaṃ dhatte yadagaṇitabhārā vasumatī /
analyzed: yad ālokam bhramati raviḥ aśrānta turagaḥ sat ālokam dhatte yat agaṇita bhārā vasumatī

original: na sa svārthaḥ kaścitprakṛtiriyameva mahatāṃ yadete lokānāṃ hitasukharasaikāntarasikāḥ // Śl_101 //
analyzed: na sa sva arthaḥ kaścid prakṛtiḥ iyam eva mahatām yat ete lokānām hita sukha rasa ekānta rasikāḥ

analyzed: avidyā dhūmra andha bhrama parigata vyākula gati pradīpte duḥkha agnau patitam avaśam vīkṣya bhuvanam

original: sphuradvahnijvālā pramathitaśiroveṣṭananibhā yātante ye 'trādbhuta iha puruṣāste sukṛtinaḥ // Śl_102 //
analyzed: sphurat vahni jvālā pramathita śiroveṣṭana nibhāḥ yātante ye iha puruṣāḥ te su kṛtinaḥ

analyzed: avīcim gāhante hutavaha śikhā pūritam api prasarpat romāñcāḥ hima nikara candra aṃśu śiśiram

analyzed: para arthe x x x sphuṭa nalina hāsā api nalinī karoti eṣām tāpam hutavaha śikhā saṃhatiḥ iva

original: parahitakaraṇāya baddhakakṣāḥ sukhamasipattravane vasanti santaḥ /
analyzed: para hita karaṇāya baddha kakṣāḥ sukham asipattravane vasanti santaḥ

original: na punaramarasundarīsahāyāḥ kṣaṇamapi nandanakānane ramante // Śl_104 //
analyzed: na punar amara sundarī sahāyāḥ kṣaṇam api nandana kānane ramante

original: aśaraṇajanatāraṇāya tīrṇāḥ punarapi vaitaraṇīṃ taranti dhīrāḥ /
analyzed: aśaraṇa jana tāraṇāya tīrṇāḥ punar api vaitaraṇīm taranti dhīrāḥ

original: na tu gaganasarittaraṃgabhaṅgavyatikarasaṅgasukhaṃ svayaṃ bhajante // Śl_105 //
analyzed: na tu gagana sarit taraṃga bhaṅga vyatikara saṅga sukham svayam bhajante

original: iti sucaritaratnaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ śivamamṛtamudāraṃ bhāsuraṃ bhāsurāṇām /
analyzed: iti su carita ratnam bhūṣaṇam bhūṣaṇānām śivam amṛtam udāram bhāsuram bhāsurāṇām

original: asulabhamakṛtajñairnandanaṃ nandanānāṃ bhaja samasukhahetuṃ maṅgalaṃ maṅgalānām // Śl_106 //
analyzed: a sulabham a kṛtajñaiḥ nandanam nandanānām bhaja sama sukha hetum maṅgalam maṅgalānām

analyzed: sugata vacana puṣpāt artha rāśiḥ niṣevyaḥ madhuni mudha karāṇām yasya vāñchā prakarṣam

original: visṛja viṣayānnītyākīrṇāṃ kṣaṇavyayasaṅgino bhaja samasukhaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ kṛtāntabhayojjhitam /

original: iti nigadatā yadupārjitaṃ puṇyaṃ mayā kiyatsugatacarite kṛtvā śraddhāmanena jano 'khilaḥ /

analyzed: kara tala samāḥ spaṣṭa ālokāḥ praśānta kṛśānavaḥ sthala kamalinī pattra channāḥ bisa aṅkura danturāḥ

original: śucisurabhayaḥ sphullāmbhojairvibhūṣitabhūmayo dadhatu narakāḥ sphītāṃ śobhāṃ saśīkaravāyavaḥ // Śl_113 //

analyzed: muni jana kathā goṣṭhī bandhaiḥ samāvṛta varṣibhiḥ satata śiśiraḥ subhaga candra ālokaḥ prayātu kṛtārtha tām

original: // iti śiṣyalekhanāma dharmakāvyaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti śiṣya lekha nāma dharmakāvyam samāptam

analyzed: kṛtiḥ ācārya candragomi pādasya
